content: princess mouse i sleep here my jewelry i made this little mouse for my little sister who loves it especially her princess dress and crown you can make your own little mouse princess or just an ordinary girl just use your imagination first i have the pattern for the mouse itself and after that i´ve added pattern for her clothes have fun to crochet your mouse but first you need hook size 3mm brown cotton yarn pink cotton yarn for ear´s inside parts stuffing tapestry needle some black yarn to embroider face note don´t join the row head ch2 1 5sc to the 2nd chain from the hook 2 2sc to every single_crochet 10sc 3 single_crochet to every single_crochet 4 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat around 5 single_crochet to every single_crochet 6 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet repeat around 7 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet repeat around 8 single_crochet to every single_crochet 9 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet repeat around 10-12 single_crochet to every single_crochet 13 single_crochet-decrease single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet repeat around 14 single_crochet-decrease single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet repeat around 15 single_crochet-decrease single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet repeat around 16 stuff the head 17 single_crochet-decrease single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat around 18 single_crochet-decrease around 5 single_crochet fo use tail to close hole body start from the bottom chain 2 1 6 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 2 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 3 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat around 18 single_crochet 4 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet repeat around 24 single_crochet 5 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet repeat around 30 single_crochet 6- 10 single_crochet to every single_crochet 11 single_crochet-decrease single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet repeat around 24 single_crochet 12-14 single_crochet to every single_crochet 15 single_crochet-decrease single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet repeat around 18 single_crochet 16-17 single_crochet to every single_crochet 18 single_crochet-decrease single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat around 12 single_crochet stuff the body fo leaving long tail use tail to sew the head to the body feet and arms make 4 ch2 1 6 single_crochet to the 2nd chain from the hook 2 2sc to every single_crochet 12sc 3-4 single_crochet to every single_crochet 5 single_crochet-decrease single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat around 6-13 single_crochet to every single_crochet fo leaving long tail to sew it to the body ears outside make2 chain 2 1 6 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 2 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12sc make 2 sl sts fo inside make 2 ch2 1 5sc to the 2nd chain from the hook fo sew the inside to the outside part sew ears to the head tail join the yarn to the bottom of the mouse chain 14 turn single_crochet to the 2nd chain from the hook single_crochet to every chain make 1 slp st fo finishing sew the
